channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 09:34 Air alert in Khmelnytskyi region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 09:34 Air alert in Khmelnytskyi region. Follow further messages. #Khmelnytskyi_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 09:02 The threat of shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow further reports.
item.description: 游릭 09:02 The threat of shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow further reports. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 08:22 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 08:22 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling.
